About Me

I'm a freshman at Harvey Mudd College in Claremont, CA. Having always been interested in technology and writing, as well as aesthetically pleasing designs, I'm planning to double major in Computer Science and Media Studies.

Tech excites me because it houses so many possibilities. I look forward to combining my interests in computer science, journalism, writing, graphic design, photography, and many more areas to answer some of society's most pressing problems with technical solutions.

As class president; a Women in Computer Science officer; a front-end developer for the Study Cloud website; an opinions writer for The Student Life newspaper of the Claremont colleges; a writer, designer, and photographer for The Muddraker newspaper; a tour guide; and an active member of the rock climbing team and tennis club, I'm very involved at Mudd. I care deeply about the communities that I am a part of, and always look for ways in which I can contribute.

I am looking for summer software internship opportunities that will allow me to contribute to companies addressing real issues, while improving my skills as a developer.

Please explore my website to learn more about my experience, personal projects, and passions, and what I can bring to your team.

quick facts!

the rundown

  • harvey mudd college, class of 2023 president
  • computer science & media studies major
  • women in cs officer, society of women engineers
  • study cloud website team (front-end)
  • the muddraker & the student life newspapers
  • tour guide, rock climbing team, club tennis

interests

  • programming: python, go, html, css, sass, javascript
  • graphic design: adobe photoshop & indesign
  • journalism: writing, copy editing, layout, photography
  • languages: english, chinese, french
  • exercise: rock climbing, tennis, hiking
  • hobbies: photography, baking, reading, playing piano

things I like

  • the color blue (just in case you couldn't tell)
  • nature (yosemite is my favorite place in the world)
  • carbs (especially the honey wheat bread at panera)
  • music (chopin's nocturne op. 9 no. 2 is a favorite)
  • books (highly recommend: when breath becomes air)
  • the new york times (opinion report & evening briefing!)

I built this website using HTML, CSS, Sass, and JavaScript.
